alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Decatur; Early; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 3:26PM EST until January 02 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 430 PM EST. * At 326 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Blakely to 6 miles east of Cottonwood, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Morgan, Donalsonville, Blakely, Arlington, Leary, Douglasville, Centerville, Iron City, Damascus, Brinson, Jakin, Iveys Mill, Parksville, Rock Hill, Donaldsonville A/P, Rowena, Howards Mill, Commissary Hill and Turman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Calhoun; Decatur; Early; Miller; Seminole
